data.title: NBA.com: NBA Communications
data.text:
Basketball without Borders to be held in Portugal for first time, returns to Argentina and South Africa

The 2013 Basketball without Borders (BWB) schedule will feature a first-time camp in Portugal, and will return to Argentina and South Africa, it was announced today by the National Basketball Association (NBA) and the International Basketball Federat

read more

46 international players from 27 countries and territories to compete in NBA Playoffs

When the NBA Playoffs tip off on April 17, team rosters (active and inactive) will feature 46 international players from 27 countries and territories. Fifteen of 16 teams competing in the Playoffs will feature at least one international player.

read more

Pistons’ Austin Daye and Bucks’ Carlos Delfino suspended

Detroit Pistons forward Austin Daye and Milwaukee Bucks guard Carlos Delfino have each been suspended one game without pay for their roles in an altercation that took place during Wednesday night’s preseason game, it was announced today by Stu Jack
